Author: sstephenn
Text: Tbh when you’re not eating enough you’re probably not getting enough electrolytes anyways. Water retention is normal and you want it because your body needs to able to retain water, but you shouldn’t bloat that much. As for constipation your digestion can slow when you don’t eat enough consistently and it can be difficult to pass if you don’t have enough to make a bowel movement. It will be ok & will pass! :-)
